xs:doc.xs:title: DocBook shell for XSLStyle™ test harness
xs:doc.para: This XSLStyle™ test harness allows instantaneous review of the processing in Internet Explorer without interfering with the check-in process to the source code control system (because IE "locks" the file being browsed).

In addition, there is a bug in Internet Explorer that prevents hyperlinks in files with ".xsl" extension processed with XSL stylesheets from working. The bug is avoided by using this test harness in a browser.
There is no logic in this stylesheet and it adds nothing to the interpretation of the embedded markup in stylesheets; it is only a wrapper with a different filename extension.
